Headline: Red Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are running with wait times of up to 30 minutes; we're working to restore service. Allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are running, but with extended wait times. Some riders may experience wait times of up to 30 minutes while our crews work to restore regular service levels.

Use trackers to look for live arrival information and consider available alternatives, such a local bus routes or buses to/from other 'L' lines.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #85 Central Temporary Reroute at Central/Augusta
ShortDescription: 85 Central buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Central, Division, Austin, Chicago and Central, due to street blockage near Central/Augusta.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#85 Central buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Central, Division, Austin, Chicago, then resume their normal route on Central, due to street blockage near Central/Augusta.

Allow extra travel time.
